effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use's power is added to this move's power, to a maximum of 200.
effects.shortEffect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

moveDescription:
The user attacks the target with an echoing voice.
If this move is used every turn, its power
is increased.
